-- Program ODC120E uses program ID "ODHC08C" for permission handling, according
to historical reason
//19-03-2003 JP SCR #1620 implementation
-- Reset variables
only if record changed
... first determine the reinsurance contract number, which is used in the
parts and finally stored in CLSR/DEBC_REINSURANCECONTRACT
-- Send request to Euler Hermes to ask for an external limit/grade request
-- Perform database updates
-- In case of an error go back to screen
-- else no external request is necessary, perform database updates
cancel answer = 'N'
cancel answer <> 'N'
end CANCEL
-- Euler Test -> An already existing external source llimit request cannot be
changed if there exists a row in MQ209 (request without decision from Euler)
CLSR request already exist
//03-06-2003 JP SCR #3670 DEBH does not belong to 'DE' or 'AT' and VC request
//16-06-2003 JP SCR #3771 amount is mandatory for bank source
check information code
-- Euler search criteria (SmartLink)
-- Initialization of requested amount
-- Initialization of checkboxes for further request options

ExpSyntax.val: VarMod ('{0,8}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,19}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,20}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,21}'VAR)

Text.val: -- Decision code form Euler / Hermes
... set variables
... create new row in CREDIT_LIMIT_SOURCE_REQUEST
... in case of Euler Hermes request, some additional CLSR DB fields have to be
updated
... check if request status has to be changed
... call batchjob BDC109 and send output parameter CLSR_JOURNALNO
-- Step 4: Final database updates
... and delete MQ14/79
-- Step 5 Update DEBTOR_CLIENT
-- Signal calling program that a new source request was initialized
... fetch CODE_NUMBERN (no selection on language necessary)
... if CODE_NUMBERN <> 99999 a decision was taken by Euler, so status has not
to be changed (= 4), if no decision was taken by Euler status has to be
set to 1
